name: The Final Monday
description:
WASD - Movement

SPACE - Interact (Coffee machines, supply boxes or workers)

M - Toggle Music Mute

Keep workers satisfied by serving the coffee. If a machine runs out of coffee, get a bag from a box and fill the machine back up. If you managed to get to the next monday, remember to use your hard earned MONEY to gain UPGRADES from the shop to cope better on the next monday.
